note:
Hi, I'm Aaron Parecki, Senior Security Architect at Okta, and co-founder of
IndieWebCamp.
I maintain oauth.net, write and consult about OAuth, and
participate in the OAuth Working Group at the IETF. I also help people learn about video production and livestreaming and dabble in product design.

I've been tracking my location since 2008 and I wrote 100 songs in 100 days.
I've spoken at conferences around the world about
owning your data,
OAuth,
quantified self,
and explained why R is a vowel. Read more.
name: Aaron Parecki

content.html: a story in 5 parts. I appreciate the commitment to keeping the twitter reply chain going.
content.value: a story in 5 parts. I appreciate the commitment to keeping the twitter reply chain going.

content.html:
good news: my Mastodon/fediverse timeline has already ramped up to the level of activity of my Twitter timeline

bad news: catching up on my Mastodon/fediverse timeline is now as noticeably bad for my mental health as Twitter was
content.value: good news: my Mastodon/fediverse timeline has already ramped up to the level of activity of my Twitter timeline  bad news: catching up on my Mastodon/fediverse timeline is now as noticeably bad for my mental health as Twitter was

content.html: Some day we're going to look back at social media and say "what are you talking about, there's no way everyone on Twitter was all on one instance"
content.value: Some day we're going to look back at social media and say "what are you talking about, there's no way everyone on Twitter was all on one instance"

content.html: Whenever I open twitter now, the home timeline has like 2 new tweets. I'm not sure if this is because the twitter infrastructure is failing, or because actually there was one person individually responsible for creating your home timeline and they were fired last week
content.value: Whenever I open twitter now, the home timeline has like 2 new tweets. I'm not sure if this is because the twitter infrastructure is failing, or because actually there was one person individually responsible for creating your home timeline and they were fired last week

content.html:
Whoever did the electrical wiring in this apartment should have their license revoked.

1) the circuit marked "bedrooms" serves literally every lower outlet in the entire place, including both bedrooms and the living room, and the only place to hook up an AC ...
content.value: Whoever did the electrical wiring in this apartment should have their license revoked.   1) the circuit marked "bedrooms" serves literally every lower outlet in the entire place, including both bedrooms and the living room, and the only place to hook up an AC ...

content.html: This graph is the number of fediverse messages per day my little single-user instance has been receiving over the past year. Something is different.

content.html: The number of people in my Twitter timeline still posting about anything other than the Twitter collapse is rapidly diminishing
content.value: The number of people in my Twitter timeline still posting about anything other than the Twitter collapse is rapidly diminishing

content.html:
If your web app uses Twitter to log users in, this would be a great time to add some alternative authentication methods!

You may also want to make a plan to handle account recovery for people who have already deleted their Twitter accounts...
content.value: If your web app uses Twitter to log users in, this would be a great time to add some alternative authentication methods!  You may also want to make a plan to handle account recovery for people who have already deleted their Twitter accounts...

content.html:
The "live rent-free in my head" meme is one of my favorite things.

And if you don't know what that is, go look it up, and then it will live rent-free in your head.
content.value: The "live rent-free in my head" meme is one of my favorite things.   And if you don't know what that is, go look it up, and then it will live rent-free in your head.

name: How to Build a Restreaming Server with a Raspberry Pi
summary: First of all, what is a restreaming server? Sometimes you want to livestream video from a device like an ATEM Mini or OBS to multiple destinations. Many devices and software like this will let you push video to just one RTMP destination at a time.
author: https://aaronparecki.com/

content.html:
soooo ActivityPub, can we talk?

I ran some stats on the types of messages my single-user instance has received in its lifetime:

Create: 257,378
Announce (boosts, whatev): 39,168
Like: 16,723

These all seem normal.

Delete: 386,953 ðŸ¤¯

Why have I received more Delete activities than all other messages combined??
